TopicTitle: Positions on Eve that exceed 6000 meters?

Articles.Content: I made an eve landing and assent craft, however it can only get into orbit from a minimum altitude of 6000 meters above sea level. Are there any larger areas on the new Eve in 0.21 that exceed this? I know of one, however it's tiny and I would probably have to retry like 50 times to hit it :/

Several. Here's a topo map I collected from MapSat data: http://i.imgur.com/Q8I5AWC.png

saik0 has collected higher-resolution data you can look through here: https://mega.co.nz/#F!8EAnSL5Z!OAyLBQqrQtlmfL0GT8fcQg!EBYyXRxA, hopefully he will update kerbalmaps.com with the updated Eve terrain fairly soon.

Edited August 4, 2013 by tavert
